statements: UPDATE payment_transactions SET amount = 500.00, payer_account = '1234567890' WHERE transaction_id = 1
UPDATE payment_transactions SET payee_account = '9876543210', transaction_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE transaction_id = 2
UPDATE payment_transactions SET amount = 1500.50, transaction_date = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 101;
UPDATE payment_transactions SET payer_account = 'John Doe', payee_account = 'Alice Smith' WHERE transaction_id = 102;
UPDATE payments SET amount = 100.50, currency = 'USD' WHERE payment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE customers SET email = 'john.doe@example.com', registration_date = '2022-03-15 10:45:00' WHERE customer_id = '98765432-1000-2000-3000-123456789abc';
UPDATE payments SET amount = 100.50, time_stamp = '2022-10-25 08:30:00' WHERE payment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE customers SET email = 'updatedemail@example.com', registration_date = '2022-10-22 14:45:00' WHERE customer_id = '987e6543-21b9-d312-a654-426614174009';
UPDATE transactions SET status = 'completed' WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE payments SET payment_amount = 1000 WHERE payment_id = 2;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount + 100 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE payments SET payment_amount = 500.50, payment_method = 'Credit Card' WHERE customer_id = 10;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1500.55 WHERE transaction_id = 101;
UPDATE users SET username = 'john_doe' WHERE user_id = 201;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.75, timestamp = '2022-01-15 12:00:00' WHERE transaction_id = 1234;
